EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Cincinnati Holiday Party_Cincinnati_Q418.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Holiday Happy Hour | Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registrering for the Cloud-Native Workshop in Santa Monica on April 11th. You will be contacted when your registration is confirmed.
We hope you will leave this workshop with a better understanding of cloud-native development <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native]]> and how to adopt it moving forward. If you would like to participate in hands-on exercises please bring a laptop.
Please note that registration and breakfast will be held at Pivotal Labs Santa Monica <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Real+Office+Centers,+Santa+Monica/@34.0193967,-118.4966953,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x80c2a4cec2c92a97:0x3d06ccbca95fb3b6!8m2!3d34.0193967!4d-118.4945013]]> at 8:45AM, moving to ROC Santa Monica <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Real+Office+Centers,+Santa+Monica/@34.0193967,-118.4966953,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x80c2a4cec2c92a97:0x3d06ccbca95fb3b6!8m2!3d34.0193967!4d-118.4945013]]> at 10:00AM.
Date: Tuesday, April 11, 2017
Time:
8:45AM to 2:15PM
Location: ROC Santa Monica 604 Arizona Avenue Santa Monica, CA, 90401 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Real+Office+Centers,+Santa+Monica/@34.0193967,-118.4945013,15z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0x3d06ccbca95fb3b6!8m2!3d34.0193967!4d-118.4945013]]>)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at CONTACT@pivotal.io <[[mailto:events@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[]]>
